Package com.example.atheneum.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BookRequestViewHolder
    To hold all requests on a book
    BookViewHolder
    The books view holder.
    ConnectionChecker
    Class for checking whether or not device is connected to the internet.
    EditTextWithValidator
    Small class to aggregate an EditText with a TextValidator to allow manually calling the validator when needed, ie.
    EmailValidator
    Does checking of emails for validity
    FirebaseAuthUtils
    Utility class to reduce boilerplate code for dealing with FirebaseAuth
    FirebaseQueryLiveData
    Provides a LiveData wrapper for a DataSnapshot obtained from a Firebase Query See: https://firebase.googleblog.com/2017/12/using-android-architecture-components.html https://firebase.googleblog.com/2017/12/using-android-architecture-components_20.html https://firebase.googleblog.com/2017/12/using-android-architecture-components_22.html
    NonEmptyTextValidator
    Checks if an field is empty and displays a warning
    OwnerBooksAdapter
    Bind Measurements to OwnerBooksRecyclerView in MainActivity See: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/layout/recyclerview#java See: https://www.androidhive.info/2016/01/android-working-with-recycler-view/ Might no longer need it once FirebaseRecyclerAdapter is done
    OwnerBooksAdapter.MeasurementViewHolder
    The books view holder.
    PhotoUtils
    Does encoding and decoding for photo bitmaps
    requestAdapter
    The type Request adapter handles displaying arrays.
    TextValidator
    Class that is used to validate changes to a TextView as the text within the TextView changes.
